Question 40.Question: Please describe any differences in how it impacted your learning (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 40.Response: Teachers grade assessments to specific rubrics so their feedback is obviously more valuable. However, some assessments or feedback on questions is so specific, it is never applicable again.

Question 41.Question: Were there any differences in how the feedback made you feel (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 41.Response: GenAI feedback is more detailed and offers opportunities to ask more questions.
